dict.string: ClaudeController needs Bluetooth access to connect to your PS5 DualSense controller for navigation and command input.
ClaudeController uses Bluetooth to communicate with your PS5 DualSense controller.
ClaudeController uses speech recognition to convert your voice commands into text input when you press the Options button on your controller.
ClaudeController needs microphone access to enable voice-to-text functionality when using the Options button on your controller.
